public class FlipFitUserDAOImpl extends Object implements FlipFitUserDAOInterface
Implementation class for FlipFitUserDAOInterface. Handles database operations related to user management.

  • Method Details

    • authenticateUser

      public int authenticateUser(String userEmail, String userPassword, int roleId)
      Authenticates user based on provided email, password, and role ID.
      Specified by:
      authenticateUser in interface FlipFitUserDAOInterface
      Parameters:
      userEmail - The email of the user.
      userPassword - The password of the user.
      roleId - The role ID of the user.
      Returns:
      The user ID if authentication is successful; -1 if password does not match; 0 if no user found.

    • createUser

      public int createUser(int userId, String userEmail, String userPassword, int roleId)
      Creates a new user with the provided details.
      Specified by:
      createUser in interface FlipFitUserDAOInterface
      Parameters:
      userId - The generated user ID (auto-generated from database).
      userEmail - The email of the user.
      userPassword - The password of the user.
      roleId - The role ID of the user.
      Returns:
      The user ID of the newly created user.

    • changeUserPassword

      public boolean changeUserPassword(int userId, String userPassword)
      Changes the password of an existing user.
      Specified by:
      changeUserPassword in interface FlipFitUserDAOInterface
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user whose password is to be changed.
      userPassword - The new password for the user.
      Returns:
      True if password change is successful; false otherwise.
